title: ClearPath Networks Partners with HP to Drive NFV Technology for Carriers
text:
ClearPath Networks Partners with HP to Drive NFV Technology for Carriers 
ClearPath selected as an OpenNFV partner to enable personalized vCPE October 12, 2015 02:00 AM   
EL SEGUNDO, Calif.- ClearPath Networks (ClearPath), which empowers Communications Services Providers (CSPs) to transform their service delivery model by enabling the most personalized and cost-effective managed services to Small Medium Businesses (SMBs), consumers, and distributed enterprises, announced that it has been selected by HP as an OpenNFV Application partner . 
The HP OpenNFV Partner Program includes innovative Independent Software Vendors (ISVs), along with the leading Network Equipment Providers (NEPs), technology vendors, and service providers that offer the freedom of choice to make the transition to Network Functions Virtualization (NFV). Application partners are ISVs that conduct testing, and validation on the HP OpenNFV Platform . 
ClearPath Network’s CEO Cliff Young commented “ We are excited about our collaboration with HP, and becoming an OpenNFV Application Partner. ClearPath’s Virtual Services Platform (VSP) combined with HP OpenNFV components, address CSP requirements for scaling out embedded virtual network functions that enable game-changing offerings and true CSP transformation.” 
“ The HP OpenNFV Partner Program provides an open, proven and innovative NFV environment for multi-vendor collaboration and exchange between all contributors in the value chain ,” said Werner Schaefer, vice president, Network Functions Virtualization, HP. “ ClearPath’s virtualized CPE (vCPE) technology is complementary with HP NFV offerings, providing a highly efficient and customized platform for delivering and managing virtualized services for service providers. We are pleased to add ClearPath Networks solutions to our application portfolio, and already jointly pursuing NFV opportunities with major operators .” 
ClearPath selected HP because of the complementary fit between ClearPath’s VSP vCPE platform and HP’s Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade Platform and NFV Director’s Network Service Orchestrator (NSO) as well as its open NFV ecosystem. “ Together we can offer a highly differentiated, high-value vCPE solution for managed service delivery to SMBs, ” said Cliff Young ClearPath’s CEO. “ We are already pursuing a number of joint opportunities with major operators in North America, Europe, and Asia .” 
ClearPath leverages NFV and SDN to virtualize and optimize vCPE, which in turn has dramatically altered the economics for managed services delivery, enabling a range of scale-out use cases that would otherwise be prohibitively expensive. ClearPath’s VSP vCPE platform enables CSPs to: Offer a wide range of Virtualized Network Functions (VNFs) from many vendors Customize vCPE services across a large number of end users Deploy VNFs from multiple vendors across diverse NFV infrastructure at the provider or customer facility Lifecycle Manage (LCM) VNFs, VNF configurations, and NFV containers 
ClearPath has qualified its VSP vCPE platform to run on HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade Platform and is currently integrating VSP with HP NFV Director NSO. The combined solution, which complies with the NFV Architectural Framework , exploits ClearPath’s unique NFV containerization, application-layer service chaining, and VNF LCM to enable personalized managed services delivery to millions of end users. 
News Highlights ClearPath Networks was selected as an HP OpenNFV Application Partner focused on personalized, highly-cost effective vCPE ClearPath has integrated its VSP vCPE platform with HP’s Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade Platform and is currently integrating VSP with HP’s NFV Director Network Service Orchestrator ClearPath and HP are already pursuing joint opportunities with some of the world’s most innovative operators 
About ClearPath Networks 
ClearPath Networks is a pioneer in NFV containerization and a visionary leader in distributed virtual network function lifecycle management for network operators globally. 
Founded in 2002 and headquartered in California, ClearPath enables delivery of Virtualized Network Function as a Service (VNFaaS). ClearPath’s NFV-based Virtual Services Platform (VSP) enables mobile, fixed and cloud operators to overcome traditional CAPEX, OPEX and agility barriers that inhibit innovation and competitive differentiation and accelerates time to value. ClearPath actively promotes industry standards and open source, and holds senior leadership positions in ETSI NFV ISG , OPNFV , OpenDaylight and Open Networking Foundation . 
For more information on ClearPath please refer to www.clearpathnet.com Contacts
